title: 186. Mick Elliot: Squidge Dibley Destroys Everything (with Adrian Beck)
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: The wonderful author and illustrator Mick Elliott joins podcaster Dani Vee and guest kid lit co-host and author Adrian Beck to chat about Squidge Dibley and how he destroys everything! They chat about illustrating, writing for kids, literature and the writing process. Adrian puts Mick to the test with his game show Mick's MashUp where our favourite Australian kid lit authors drop in, and then Mick turns the tables on Dani and Adrian. A jam-packed super fun episode!
itunes:subtitle: The wonderful author and illustrator Mick Elliottâ€¦
description: The wonderful author and illustrator Mick Elliott joins podcaster Dani Vee and guest kid lit co-host and author Adrian Beck to chat about Squidge Dibley and how he destroys everything! They chat about illustrating, writing for kids, literature and the writing process. Adrian puts Mick to the test with his game show Mick's MashUp where our favourite Australian kid lit authors drop in, and then Mick turns the tables on Dani and Adrian. A jam-packed super fun episode!
